title: game keeps making me reconect to a game that ended hours ago
body: at the end of a game. it didnt load the stats so i clicked skip waiting for stats and everything seemed normal. i took a break for like 3-5 hours and came back to play another match. and when i went to enter another match it told me that i was already in one and to restart my cliant so i did that and now it keeps asking me to reconnect to that game, remind you it ended hours ago and every time i try to reconnect it brings up a window that says that i coudlent connect to the server. and i am stuck in a loop of trying to connect to the server and not being able to (also the game did not show in my match history and i did not gain any ip for it) . one thing that i think i might be and this is probobly far fetched but, in that game there was a tristana who kept jumping like she got her reset for a kill yet there was no kill and her ult was sending people dubble the distance some time. i asked her in all chat if she was hacking. got no responce and i just went, "im gonna report for hacks this is bs" and. if she was she might of did this to my game so i could not report her or something. i know it sounds verry unlikely but its a possibility. anyways any help i can get would be great and the sooner the better, i cant play league untill its fixed

replies.body:
What you experienced is what is referred to as a "ghost game". This happens when the game server fails to send a message to the matchmaking platform that your match has concluded and results have been recorded. This leaves you in an awkward spot until the platform is finally updated on what happened.

If you're still experiencing this issue, please let me know.

It's just something that is happening commonly today. i don't mind much, but I really need the win I just got.. Of course, all the reds go completely silent every time this happens. Their response in tickets is just "Lol u gotta wait it out up to 2 hours sorry bye"
